RNAstructure_java_interface.source.menus

Class RolloverMenu.RolloverListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • RNAstructure_java_interface.source.menus.RolloverMenu.RolloverListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MouseListener, Serializable, EventListener
    Enclosing class:
    RolloverMenu

    public class RolloverMenu.RolloverListener
extends Object
implements MouseListener, Serializable
    An inner class that creates a rollover listener for menus in the RNAstructure GUI.

    The rollover text is placed in the message bar at the bottom of the main application frame, whenever a user interacts with the menu item this listener is attached to, and removed to make way for the default message text when the user stops interacting with the menu item.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
